bioconda.name: bioconductor-medme
bioconda.summary: Modelling Experimental Data from MeDIP Enrichment

biotools.summary: A tool allows the prediction of absolute and relative methylation levels based on measures obtained by MeDIP-microarray experiments.

bioschemas.name: MEDME
bioschemas.summary: A tool allows the prediction of absolute and relative methylation levels based on measures obtained by MeDIP-microarray experiments.
